title: Functions of the Grid: Changing the Status of an Item
body:
Functions of the Grid: Changing the Status of an Item¶

Sometimes an item will allow you to change its status, which lets others know what steps need to be taken or how the item has been interacted with.

  1. Click

  2. Click Change Status

  3. Click the current status under Status

  4. Select desired status (incomplete, pending, submitted, approved, rejected, reviewed, or exported)

  5. Click the

  6. Click Save
toc: • Functions of the Grid: Changing the Status of an Item
